title.narrative: Cotton factory - Many paths of cotton in global trade

description.narrative: The non-governmental oraganization For Ethical Trade is concentrated on global trade and its impacts on human rights and environment. In this global education project we deal with global agriculture business production chains related to it and the role of people acting in different roles in the chain. We focus on cotton because it is not only one of the most important cash-crop but also raw material for jeans we wear every day. We are all in a way part of the chain that is unfair. To be able to change the s ystem more just we must be aware of the system and how it works. The project will start in May 2015 and run until May 2017.The target group of the project is young people aged 13-18 years and their teachers. Our project also reaches volunteers who want to learn more about global trade and act to change the system and make the young more conscious. We begin the project by writing a report about global cotton business and producing teaching material for teachers and volunteers. We also translate into Finnish a documentary and a website called Cotton Project and made by Laura Kissel as a part of the teaching material. The essential idea in the material is to use functional methods that consider the pupils as active and thoughtful actors. With elder pupils aged 15-18 years we use drama and with younger ones we use other functional methods. We explain the division by the observation that drama as a method is often too requiring at a certain age but the older pupils already can deal with empathizing and trust that the method requires.The volunteers participating in the project are educated twice a year: in March and October. In the trainings volunteers make themselves familiar with the material and the methods meet other volunteers and share the best practices. The main activity in the project are workshops we organize in schools. Workshops are facilitated by volunteers and a professional theater expression adviser. The adviser also produces a society theatre project in co-operation with the students participating i n the workshops.
